gaslighting_examples.text: That never happened, you're imagining things again.
You're too sensitive, you always overreact to everything.
That's not what I said. You're twisting my words and making a big deal out of nothing.

guilt_trip_examples.text: After all I've done for you, this is how you treat me?
Everyone else would help their friend. Any good person would.
I'm so disappointed in you. I thought you were different. I'm really hurt.

love_bombing_examples.text: You're my soulmate, I've never felt this way before. We're perfect for each other!
I can't wait to move in together and get married. Imagine our future, growing old together.

future_faking_examples.text: Once you quit your job, we'll travel the world together. It'll be perfect!
Someday we'll have that dream house and amazing life.

hoovering_examples.text: I've been thinking about you constantly. I miss you so much. I can't stop dreaming about you.
I've changed, I'm different now. I've been in therapy and realized what I did wrong.
Remember the good times we had? How happy we were together?

emotional_blackmail_examples.text: If you don't do this, I'll leave. You'll lose everything.
You owe me. After all I've done for you, family should stick together.
You're so selfish and ungrateful. You're hurting me so much.
If you loved me, you would do this. This proves you don't care.

triangulation_examples.text: My ex would never treat me this way. They always respected my needs.
Everyone agrees with me. They all think you're being unreasonable. My friends say the same thing.
Someone told me about you. They said that you were talking behind my back.
Unlike you, at least they would never do something like that. They're better than you.

projection_examples.text: You always lie to me! You're the one who can't be trusted!
You're so manipulative. You're just trying to control me!
I'm the victim here! You're attacking me! You're the abusive one!
You're just jealous. You're so envious that you can't stand seeing me happy.

breadcrumbing_examples.text: Got a random text at 2am: 'hey what's up'. Haven't heard from them in weeks.
They liked my Instagram post but cancelled our plans again. Something came up.
I always text first. They only respond but never reach out. Been a while since they initiated.
They keep it light, don't want to talk about anything deep. Just friends, they say.

intermittent_reinforcement_examples.text: They're hot and cold - sometimes loving, sometimes distant. Never know which version I'll get.
It's amazing when they're nice, so perfect. But I'm anxious waiting, checking my phone constantly.
I'm trying to figure out what I did wrong. Analyzing everything, looking for clues.
It's up and down, a roller coaster. Exhausting. I tried to leave but keep coming back, can't quit.

scapegoating_examples.text: It's your fault. You're the problem. Wouldn't happen if you weren't here.
When I do it, everyone gets upset. But they can do the same thing and get a pass, different rules.
Remember when you messed up? Typical of you. Anyone could have done what you did, not impressed.
They didn't tell you about the meeting. Forgot to include you. We were all talking about you behind your back.
